channel.title: I think I've been banned by mistake...again
channel.description: When I try and log on with 'Akriam' it says I have been banned for spamming. Which doesn't make sence because I was not spamming :confused: This happened before when I was accidently banned for posting a trogan. Maybe someone is using my IP address as a proxy or something because sometimes when I go to rapidshare I get that message about how I can't download something becuase my IP is in the process of downloading something when in reality I havn't been to that sight in weeks :) Well, if by some chance this is not a mistake...erm...sorry? But really, if it isn't a mistake, how have I spammed, I looked at my previous posts and while they are not extremely useful they are not like making three topics that all say "G1vE m3 D4 Mop4Scap3 H4aks!"... so...ya :)

item.title: I think I've been banned by mistake...again
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

Yeah when I try to login from my cottage it says I’m banned from posting trojans. The first time I thought that I really was banned and I was wondering if someone got into my account or something… But then it worked when I came back home.

Read full topic
